solution_line_template: The loser got {loser_percentage}% of the votes because {total_percentage} - {winner_percentage} = <<{total_percentage}-{winner_percentage}={loser_percentage}>>{loser_percentage}
The winner got {winner_votes} votes because {total_voted_students} x {winner_percentage_decimal} = <<{total_voted_students}*{winner_percentage_decimal}={winner_votes}>>{winner_votes}
The loser got {loser_votes} votes because {total_voted_students} x {loser_percentage_decimal} = <<{total_voted_students}*{loser_percentage_decimal}={loser_votes}>>{loser_votes}
The winner got {vote_difference} more votes because {winner_votes} - {loser_votes} = <<{winner_votes}-{loser_votes}={vote_difference}>>{vote_difference}
